title: Becoming A Hitman
description: A fictional story that takes place on the streets of Waco, TX. Bill Becker, a former owner of a failing marketing business is forced to bring more money into his household. He lands a job as a manager at a supermarket that is run by the Manelli Crime Family. Trying not to get caught up in the life of crime that surrounds him, Bill eventually gives in, and becomes most notorious hit man in the area. 13 years after he's walked away from his criminal life, he takes the chance and tells his story to a journalist, that's looking for the next big story. Bill tells Luke, in great detail all of the murders he's committed in the past. Starting with how he got into the life, and going in to a detailed list of all of his victims. Eventually leading to everything he endured to get out of the life and retire.
author: Chester Moore
